The `HotKeyUI` class is a modal dialog in a wxPython-based graphical user interface (GUI) application that displays a scrollable panel (`HotKeyPanel`) containing editable hot key configurations.

class HotKeyUI(wx.Dialog):
    def __init__(self, parent, id, title):
        wx.Dialog.__init__(self, parent, id, title, size=(550, 500))
        self.parent = parent
        panel = HotKeyPanel(self)
        vbox = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
        vbox.Add(panel, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)
        self.SetSizer(vbox)
        self.Layout()
